* **Transparency:** Be upfront with buyers about the low-quality products you've sold in the past. Apologize for the mistakes, explain how you're changing your approach, and highlight the value of your high-quality products. 

You need to act quickly and decisively to turn the tide. The longer you go without a successful sale, the more difficult it will be to rebuild trust and attract buyers.
